member_organisations:
Cary L. Peterson, Managing Director and Principal 
Cassandra Wilkerson, Administrative Director
fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, International co-operation and development, Employment and Social Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights
eu_initiatives:
Our law firm works to enable non-governmental organizations and government agencies to broaden Trans-Atlantic affairs between Eastern Europe and the United States. 
 
The intergovernmental affairs and international diplomacy between Member States and international organizations enables main EU initiatives and awareness on global peacemaking solutions that benefit civil society.
organisation_name: Robert Peterson & Fields Associates P.C. (RPFA Law Office)
relevant_communication:
Currently Mr. Peterson is chief legal advisor to Congressional Committee on Eurasian Affairs, a political coalition based in the United States that focuses on bilateral affairs between Europe, Western Asia, and the United States. 
 
http://lobbyingdisclosure.house.gov/lookup.asp?reg_id=42916
goals__remit: A law practice possessing attorneys, solicitors, and paralegals who specialize in international diplomacy and intergovernmental affairs between the Americas, Eastern Europe, and Asia-Pacific Region.
